chapter.title: Configuring a Spacecraft's Physical Properties
chapter.para: To configure the physical properties of a spacecraft, start from the default mission and perform the following steps.

step.para: In the Resources tree, double-click on DefaultSC to open it.
Click on the Ballistic/Mass tab in the Spacecraft dialog box.
Type 450 in the DryMass text box.
Type 2.0 in the Coefficient of Drag text box.
Type 1.7 in the Coefficient of Reflectivity text box.
Type 10.5 in the Drag Area text box.
Type 12.5 in the SRP Area text box.

chapter.para: The script for the physical settings configured above is shown below.
chapter.programlisting: Create Spacecraft DefaultSC DefaultSC.DryMass = 450 DefaultSC.Cd = 2.0 DefaultSC.Cr = 1.7 DefaultSC.DragArea = 10.5 DefaultSC.SRPArea = 12.5
